name: Young White Dragon
speed: 40 ft., burrow 20 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.

special_abilities.name: Ice Walk.
descriptions: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra moment.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Claw.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6).
descriptions: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
